title: Design the NeuroplasticityOptimizer device architecture
description: Define the overall structure and components of the NeuroplasticityOptimizer device.

title: Develop the device's hardware components
description: Create the physical parts of the NeuroplasticityOptimizer device.

title: Create the software for the NeuroplasticityOptimizer
description: Program the logic and functionality of the NeuroplasticityOptimizer device.

title: Integrate the hardware and software components
description: Assemble the physical and logical parts of the NeuroplasticityOptimizer to create a functioning device.
dependencies: Create the software for the NeuroplasticityOptimizer

title: Test and validate the NeuroplasticityOptimizer device
description: Check the functionality, safety, and efficacy of the NeuroplasticityOptimizer device.
dependencies: Integrate the hardware and software components

title: Document the NeuroplasticityOptimizer device specifications
description: Create a comprehensive and detailed guide on the assembly, operation, and maintenance of the NeuroplasticityOptimizer device. Include technical specifications, safety precautions, troubleshooting steps, and best practices for optimal use.
dependencies: Integrate the hardware and software components
